lines: WARNING - THIS EPISODE CONTAINS SUBJECT MATTER OF A SEXUAL NATURE.
The high school from which you graduated is having their yearly prom. You have been asked to be a chaperone.

You arrive at the prom and see the students dressed in their begged, rented and borrowed "formal wear." Colored streamers decorate the area where the prom is being held. Young couples lean over each other, shuffling their feet in small
steps during the slow dances. You can't help but reminisce about your passage through this time in life. How does this make you feel?
In the corner of the room you notice a couple necking passionately. The young man has managed to slide his hand up the skirt and between the legs of his date. What will you do?
#WALK OVER AND MAKE YOUR PRESENCE KNOWN
Some chaperone you turned out to be!
How do you plan to accomplish this?
#ACCIDENTALLY KICK THE CHAIR THE YOUNG MAN IS SITTING ON
#INTERRUPT THEM AND ASK THEM TO CALM DOWN
"Ahem!" First attempts have no effect. "AAAAAAAHHHHEM!" Much better. They get the hint and untangle themselves until later.
Not even an earthquake could interrupt them from their passionate embrace. You can:
#INTERRUPT THEM AND ASK THEM TO CALM DOWN

Both participants look up at you sheepishly, flushed from the heat of their passionate activities. The young man searches your face for subtle signs of male approval. The young lady wishes she could disappear into one of the
She quickly kicks her panties under the metal folding chair, hoping you won't notice. You recommend that they conduct their expressions of deep emotion in a more discreet manner.
Too bad. You probably would have had a good time.
